topics.title: Game of Prompts Platform Introduction
topics.summary: Introduction to Game of Prompts (GOP), a platform combining AI challenges with blockchain solutions. Built on Celaut for immutable services and Ergo blockchain for transparent rewards, aiming to make AI development more open and collaborative through competitive challenges.

topics.title: GOP Architecture and Key Components
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of GOP's four key components: game services (AI benchmarks), solver services (participant solutions), GopWeb portal (central hub), and Ergo blockchain (secure ledger). Emphasizes how Celaut's immutability and isolation ensure trusted execution environments.

topics.title: Creator and Player Workflow Process
topics.summary: Explanation of how creators design challenges, generate secret codes, and publish game boxes on Ergo blockchain. Players find challenges, develop AI solutions, package them as Celaut services, and test locally before submitting entries with participation fees.

topics.title: Cryptographic Score Verification System
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of how scores remain secret during competition but are cryptographically verified. Uses commitment schemes with hash codes, score lists with decoys, and smart contract verification after deadline revelation of game secrets.

topics.title: Celaut Node Installation and Setup Demo
topics.summary: Live demonstration of installing Celaut node from GitHub, checking node status, and preparing the environment for GOP. Shows node address, Ergo wallet connection, and emphasizes alpha version requirements including virtual machine recommendation.

topics.title: Game Service Creation and Blockchain Submission
topics.summary: Live demo showing game service packaging process, creating Snake demo game on GOP web portal, and submitting to Ergo blockchain. Covers participation fees, creator commissions, deadlines, and game NFT creation with service hashes.

topics.title: AI Solver Development and Testing Process
topics.summary: Demonstration of creating AI solver services, including basic A-star algorithm and language model approaches. Shows service packaging, local execution with game service interaction, and the isolated execution environment ensuring fair testing.

topics.title: Game Execution and Score Submission Demo
topics.summary: Live gameplay demonstration showing AI solver playing Snake, generating participation data with commitments and score lists. Shows submission process to blockchain, deadline waiting, and final game resolution with winner determination and prize distribution.

topics.title: GOP Benefits for AI Development
topics.summary: Explanation of GOP's advantages including fair AI testing through code-based rules, innovation rewards, decentralized collaboration, and censorship-resistant AI model sharing. Emphasizes how it breaks down traditional AI development silos.

topics.title: Future AI Challenge Applications
topics.summary: Overview of potential GOP applications beyond Snake game including robot navigation, algorithmic trading, scientific discovery, strategic planning, code optimization, and natural language processing. Emphasizes any quantifiably scorable AI task can become a challenge.

topics.title: Platform Vision and Development Roadmap
topics.summary: Discussion of GOP's future plans including community building, advanced evaluation metrics, better development tools, and multi-chain support. Positions GOP as a worldwide platform for incentivized and transparent AI model development and testing.
